arts.ttl: For Florida's Clayton, spiking football and saying so long to Pitino leads to the Final Four
arts.sum: And when following Rick Pitino after the coach moved from Iona to St. John’s seemed like a good choice two years ago, Clayton chose Florida instead. He said he thinks the lack of recruiting for basketball — even the Florida coach at the time, Mike White, wouldn’t give him a look — was largely based on the fact that most coaches thought football would be his sport.

arts.ttl: UEFA confirm decision as Real Madrid quartet Kylian Mbappe, Vinicius Junior, Antonio Rudiger, Dani Ceballos learn their fate
arts.sum: Real Madrid receive a major boost for next week's Champions League quarter-final first leg against Arsenal, with Kylian Mbappe, Vinicius Junior, Antonio Rudiger and Dani Ceballos all cleared to play.

arts.ttl: Nathan Ordaz scores, LAFC blanks Leo Messi and Inter Miami 1-0 in 1st leg of CONCACAF Champions Cup
arts.sum: Nathan Ordaz scored in the 57th minute, and Los Angeles FC kept Lionel Messi off the scoresheet Wednesday night in a 1-0 victory over Inter Miami in the first leg of their CONCACAF Champions Cup quarterfinal matchup. The 21-year-old Ordaz put LAFC ahead when he eluded Sergio Busquets and hammered a swift shot into the bottom corner of the Herons’ net from well outside the penalty area.
